Civilization Experiment
Youtuber SilverForest160 invites you and your friends to proticapate in a Civilization Experiment.
Where 5 teams of 10 will battle for survival in the most intense conditions. From wars to mystical creatures to the unforgiving climate, 5 teams will go in only 1 will comes out alive.
Will you survive?
Join and find out!discord.com/invite/xshM7SV9eD

🌟 Welcome to Sloth SMP! 🌟




What We Offer:




✨ Custom Commands & Features: Enjoy a unique gameplay experience that stays true to regular Minecraft with our custom commands and exciting features.




Additional Perks:




🌟 Professional Staff: Our friendly and active staff are here to help and ensure a great experience.

🌟 Fair Rules: We maintain a balanced and fair environment for everyone.

🌟 Dynamic Lighting: Experience visually stunning gameplay with dynamic lighting.

🌟 Active Community: Join our vibrant player base and engaging Discord group.

🌟 Staff Opportunities: We are always looking for new staff members. Contact Sloth if interested, and consider filling out the Admin Application form at spawn!

🌟 The Market: Trade with NPCs to buy and sell items.

🌟 Quick Teleportation: Use teleportation papers to get to spawn and the Market quickly.

🌟 Starter Kit: Begin your adventure on the Realm with a helpful starter kit.

🌟 Spawn Protection: You can explore the well-protected and exciting spawn area or hang out with friends.

🌟 Name tag Easter Eggs: There is more than the simple name Easter Eggs like jeb_ and Grumm; you can listen in on our Discord or occasionally on the Realm for some special names, or you can try and find some yourself. Try the name “Dance” on the Realm when you join!

🌟 No Behavior or Resource Packs: This Realm is and will always be pack-free so you can use all your favorite global resource packs! All of our amazing features are done purely with commands.




How to Join:

Realm Code: kvbn2eegqhm

Join our Discord for Updates: Discord Invite




Note: Please make sure to read the rules on the Realm or our Discord!

Amber Isles - Season 2










Amber Isle is a modded Minecraft bedrock realm, where you can choose an origin to spice your gameplay (with 12 different origins available ! And more coming in the future).



The mod contains : new ores, new armor, new tools and weapons, new blocks, new structures and new bosses ! All themed around elements and mythes. The mod is custom made by yours truly, with consistent updates to keep the realm fresh.



Here are the main rules :


  • No griefing of any kind, in particular the main island
  • No cheats of any kind
  • No lag machines
  • Stealing is allowed
  • Killing is allowed
  • You can't kill each-other at spawn
  • PvP logging isn't allowed



If you want to join us, please go in this discord :

https://discord.gg/JqbfBK7gJG



I hope you have fun playing, even if it's not on our realm !

I run a bedrock coop survival realm (mostly vanilla). The vibes are casual, clean, mature, cooperative, competent, and chill. Seasons last 3-9 months, and we started a new season on June 13th with the 1.21 release. The folks who stay active are the ones who just want a world to build on where other people are also building. It's not a hyped up kids party that burns quick and fizzles, it's a long haul build-up of farms and then megaliths. Some people will get on vc to build together, others like myself build on our own but coordinate through dc chat. We typically have a main base with shared resources that everyone contributes something to, but also people are welcome to build their own bases. DM me if this is what you're looking for, and I'll send you the dc link. :)

FIRE SMP [​SEASON 13]

We want you 🫵 for Fire SMP!
We're a modded Minecraft realm that has existed for ~ a year now
Now,you may ask yourself what mods we offer?
The answer is:

- more ores→ more ores and corresponding tools 🪨⛏️
- the true weapons and true tools mod→ new weapons and tools you may know from the museums ⚔️
- farmers delight → several new crops and foods 🌽
- tomemancy - magical tomes and scrolls! 📜
================================================

More key information you may be interested in:
• resets are usually scarce to come by here and only happen when a majority of the community decides it's time for a new world or if Mojang decides to release an update that breaks a majority of mods.
• we don't allow our staff team to use their perms for their own enrichment. This means that admins cannot take stuff out of creative mode.
• what we do have on the realm is a newly set up shop system at spawn with currency,where you can earn yourself some of the most prestige items that are harder to come by.


• our rules are semi-anarchy oriented. That means:
- stealing from player and killing them is allowed.
- griefing is allowed in the case that the other party has done something bad to you.
- any type of exploitation or hacking is forbidden.

•Minimum discord account age is 2 months,to prevent people from evading bans by making a new account.
• Immaturity and toxicity aren't well respected on our server either.Just cut it out. Being a poison to the server will get you muted,kicked or even banned depending of the grade of your misdeeds.


The discord link:
https://discord.com/invite/SCTU7muxQ9﻿

I hope we'll be able to greet you as a new member soon!

With the new update coming out start fresh with a new world and great people! Looking for a Minecraft community that offers both Java and Bedrock crossplay? Look no further than Chamberla! This is the perfect place for gamers of all kinds to come together and enjoy the latest updates and features of Minecraft. With our Kingdoms feature, players can create their own unique and build kingdoms, complete with castles, villages, and more. Our helpful moderators are always available to answer any questions and ensure that everyone has a fun and fair gaming experience. Our community is second to none, with players from all around the world coming together to create a welcoming and inclusive environment. And with generations for every major update, you can be sure that you'll always have access to the latest and greatest features of Minecraft. So whether you're a seasoned Minecraft veteran or just starting out, come join us at Chamberla and experience all that our Chamberla has to offer! discord.gg/xzUEZY7dNZ

We are back after a long break and back more refined than ever before...

﻿Warning: ﻿Entities and content in the realm can be frightening at times do NOT ignore.
warning: ﻿RECOMMENDED ON WINDOWS 10 EDITION, MOBILE, AND SWITCH, Console players may experience difficulties joining DO NOT IGNORE.
warning: ﻿This realm is considered mega modded and requires a bit of patience to enter the world for the first time updates are very common with new content being added frequently.

﻿Warnings aside though this realm is gonna be like nothing you have ever played... that is if your new to modded realms of course.
Here on this realm we focus on longterm gameplay and replayability as well as having enough content to keep the realm feeling fresh endlessly.

﻿There are many things to expect when you first join the world such as:

New textures:

Modified vanilla mobs:

An insane ever-growing library of mob items and blocks:

Enhanced graphics overall utilizing some of the marketplace's newest content:

There are also things to expect after playing for some time:

Just expect to die a lot because this realm is not exactly easy to survive in:

Getting out of the early game is the hardest part of the progression after the early game progression is just a matter of exploration... You know your in midgame when you can comfortably kill a warden:

Intense boss fights:

Wildlife:

WILD WILD WILD LIFE...:

Dragonia such as DRAGONS uuuh WRETCHES... uuuh DRAKES FOR SURE and uh a few more dragons...

magic... oh but not just any magic DETAILED MAGIC!

﻿JOIN THE PLAYTEST NOW AND LIKE EVERY SEASON BECOME THE STRONGEST PLAYER

pvp is allowed:

hacking is not:

exploits are not glitches lag abuse etc:

griefing builds is in acts of PVP or warfare allowed:

You can give out tips to new players but note that if you are detected handing out ALOT of tips like important gameplay loop info you may be tagged as a ELITE tier player which may force you to be excluded from low level events where you would be too op for any bosses spawned... such as Nether gates, battle zones, world bosses, and lock down regions where low level players are currently settled at.

discord.gg/x2xNsXRA

[JAVA] Yumytu Realm 1.21 - a chilling survival world for adult [18+][JAVA Edition Only]

Welcome to Yumytu Realm! JAVA Edition Only
My name is Maverick, this is my chilling Minecraft survival realm and looking for members.
If you are looking for realm with community to chill after work, my realm is a place for you, do anything you want in a large world: building, zombie hunting, to be boss killers, or just work as a farmer,... Everything is ok just do not disturb other players

Version: Minecraft Java Edition 1.21
Age limit: 18+

Some realm rules:
  • Do not hack or cheat
  • Do not loot other players
  • Farms are allowed
  • Limit vulgar language

There are some datapacks installed to improve chilling experience:
  • BlazeandCave's Advancements Pack: Add new advancements and statistics
  • Info Tools: Show coordinates and time when holding compass and clock
  • Server Sleep: 1 play sleep required to skip the night
  • Player Graves: Dropping a grave when user dead, protect your item from being despawned
  • No Creeper Grief: Creeper will not break blocks but still cause damages
  • TPA: Type /trigger TPA to request teleport to specific player
  • Mine Treasure: Enhance the user's mining experience
  • New in Town | The Settler's Experience Data Pack: A multi-stage, story-driven, settler's experience
  • Villager Transportation: Villager transportation using Camels and Llamas
  • True Ending: Ender Dragon Overhaul: Better dragon to fight in the end
  • Auto Tree: Auto re-plant saplings
  • Vanilla Refresh: Adding features to Minecraft aimed to make small improvements to Minecraft
  • Some world generation enhance:
    + Dungeons and Taverns
    + Tectonic
    + Geophilic
    + Explorify
    + William Wythers' Overhauled Overworld
    + Hearths
    + Hopo Better Underwater Ruins
    + Tidal Towns
  • Some craftable items:
    + Bundles
    + Chainmail
    + Enchanted golden apples
    + Name tags
    + Hourse armors
    + Saddles
    + Tridents
You might love this realm, contact admin for any request.

Please join with us at https://discord.gg/RmQKqwWKeQ or leave your in game name in comment, I am looking forward to playing with you
